column1: prompt
Come up with 5 short sentences related to sleep.
Find the angle of elevation when a ball is thrown with an initial velocity of 15 m/s at an angle of 45 degrees.
Create a list of 6 novels from the 21st century.
Identify the type of quadrilateral formed by the points (1, 2), (3, 4), (5, 10), and (7, 6).
How recycling affects the environment?
Select five healthy snack ideas.
Create an outline of steps to install software on a computer.
Discuss the relationship between photosynthesis and respiration in plants.
Explain how to make a PB&J sandwich.
Analyze the following text for sentiment and output whether it is positive, neutral or negative. The customer service is terrible and the process is confusing.
Suggest an action I should take to become more organized.
Suggest a book you would recommend for someone interested in the history of Rome.
How can I maintain a healthy work-life balance?

What steps can someone take to become an effective leader?
Arrange 30 books in a bookshelf according to some rule. An assortment of 30 books, including fiction, non-fiction, and informational
Generate a list of five main goals for a team.
Add two sentences to an email reply to let the recipient know that you understand their situation. My apologies for the inconvenience.
Create a dinner menu that focuses on healthy eating.
Find a list of the top 5 highest mountains in the world.

Rewrite this sentence for use as a slogan:

"Service with a smile"
How do you go about finding the best deal when buying a car?
Provide a list of tips to improve communication between team members.
Determine the environmental impact of manufacturing one car.
Find the sum of two fractions: 3/4 + 7/8
Compare and contrast two different types of database management systems. Relational and Non-Relational database management systems
Give me a list of all the major cities in the given country. Norway
Write a single line of computer code to create a new column in a dataframe. mydata

Summarize the given scientific paper. This paper evaluates the impact of the newly proposed Variable Network Adoption Model (VNAM) on the accuracy of predictive data analytics tasks. VNAM is based on a dynamic architecture which can adopt to the underlying data characteristics and can be applied to supervised learning tasks.
List all the different emotions the can be inferred from the given text. He was frustrated with the outcome of the project and worried about his future.
Change the given pronouns to their possessive forms. He took his notebook and showed it to them.
Change the points in the given sentence into a single sentence. The dog barked. It wagged its tail.
Replace the given expressions with the appropriate idiom. He was so angry, he lost control and started throwing things.

Summarize the following paragraph in three to four sentences. Developers often struggle with debugging and identifying issues with software performance. Debugging tools, such as memory and performance analysis tools, are created to help developers identify and solve these issues quickly. Debugging tools collectively help developers understand the root cause of software issues and optimize the performance of their applications.
Generate a rule that describes the relationship between these two words. Petal, Flower
Recommend a food item for a person who is trying to lose weight.
Name a type of environment that is typically associated with warm, humid weather.
Classify the following shape according to simple geometry. <Picture Attached>
Swap the nouns and verbs in the following sentence. He wrote an article about the invasion.
Generate instructions for making an apple pie.
How is the narrator’s mood depicted in the following passage? The night was dark and gloomy, and the wind howled mournfully as the trees swayed in the breeze.
Do a sentiment analysis of the following text and give the output as "low sentiment", "neutral sentiment", or "high sentiment". This movie was okay but I think I could have done better.

Rewrite the following paragraph using fewer words and no loss of meaning. Manufacturers all around the globe are fighting a battle to reduce their waste and increase the sustainability of their production.
Correct the following sentence by adding punctuation and capitalization in the right places. it was a cold winters day
Write an original story related to the following  words. Time, struggle, courage
Insert a relative clause into the following statement. We need a new plan.
Identify and remove the clichés in the following text. At the end of the day, all I need is a little bit of love and understanding.

Add a subordinate clause to the following statement. The crowd was clapping.
Convert the message into a secret code. The meeting has been moved to 10 o'clock

Can you decipher the scrambled words? turecsto

Compare two given poems (example provided below) and explain the differences in language, structure and tone. Poem A:
The evening sky so blue 
You can see it through the clouds
The sinking sun so golden-tinged
The dark holds mysteries unbeknown

Poem B:
The sun is setting, a blaze of red
The clouds are turning shades of grey
The evening's calm is soon to be
The darkness brings a chilly breeze

Create a detailed description of a restaurant, including its atmosphere and a description of the food it serves.
